narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Bios of Tennessee, LLC is a Day Training, Developmentally Disabled Services provider based in Thompsons Station, TN. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $4.8M in Medicaid payments across 20K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $4.8M in Medicaid payments. While not among the largest billers, unusual patterns in providers of this size can still indicate systemic issues worth monitoring.
